name: Rabbit's Carrot Rush
description:
Short Description:

A     wonderful day in the carrot garden. And oh look! There’s a rabbit! There might be more rabbits around!?

Goal:

Battle to be the first one to earn 20 carrots before anyone else does! No time limit, just you and your friends.. or enemies? You can even  play solo and practice the ways you’ll run!

Player 1 will play on the Keyboard, 

Player 2, 3 and 4 can join in using a Gamepad.

Controls:

(Keyboard)

Walk: W/A/S/D

Harvest: E/Space

Pause: Escape

(Gamepad)

Walk: Left Stick

Harvest: Button South / Right Trigger

Pause: Start/Select

Development-Information:

Ludum-Dare-52-Jam Version: v0.1.0

Made with: Unity Engine 2021.3 🔥 

Development Time: 16 hours (live on Twitch) 🔥 

Created By 1 Person: @MostWanted38| Lars C.
